programme.title: Crossword Mysteries
programme.desc: After several of the clues in her recent puzzles are linked to the murder of an art gallery owner, a crossword puzzle editor is drawn into the investigation; while searching for answers, she clashes with the no-nonsense detective overseeing the case.

programme.title: Sailing Into Love
programme.desc: A biology teacher juggles her duties as bridesmaid to three friends, as well as teaching a summer enrichment class at her favorite place in the world.

programme.title: Where Your Heart Belongs
programme.desc: When a marketing executive returns home to help with her best friend's wedding, she learns the hard way that love and support from family and friends means more than she'd ever imagined.

programme.title: Winter Love Story
programme.desc: When author Cassie's first novel isn't selling, she is paired on a book tour with author Elliot to boost her sales - but along the way, a romance starts to blossom.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur is trying to win over investors for the dating app she has developed. To help bring on investors for expansion, she promises to take part in using it in the coming weeks before Christmas to find love and track her progress.

programme.desc: Newly engaged Asha Singh and Jake O'Brien are excited to spend Christmas together, but their relationship is tested when their families' cultural and holiday traditions clash.

programme.desc: Norm paints Rebecca's office and apartment to pay off his overextended bar tab.

programme.desc: Cliff (John Ratzenberger) handcuffs himself to his mother's (Frances Sternhagen) house in an effort to save it from demolition.

programme.desc: Van insists on coaching Reba after she agrees to compete against Brock in a 5K race to raise money for Jake's school.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van announces he is quitting school to try out for arena football, but Reba's disapproval causes him to blow his chance.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Over Brock and Barbra Jean's objections, Reba gives Kyra permission to go on her first date, then discovers the boy is 17 years old.

programme.title: Love Takes Flight
programme.desc: A workaholic hospital director is forced to re-examine her rigid lifestyle when a free-wheeling EMS pilot enters her life.

programme.title: Sweet Autumn
programme.desc: Aunt Dee splits her candy shop between her niece Maggie and maple farmer Dex. Following letters Dee left, the two uncover the reason for her decision during the Sweet Autumn festival.

programme.title: A Dash of Love
programme.desc: When an aspiring chef lands a dream job at her idol's restaurant, she befriends the handsome executive chef. After they are wrongly fired, the duo open their own eatery to prove their food is better.

programme.title: Love in the Forecast
programme.desc: An aspiring meteorologist befriends a neighbor who teaches her the importance of trusting nature and each other.

programme.title: Romance in the Air
programme.desc: A woman gets a chance at happiness when she returns home and reunites with a childhood friend.

programme.title: Hearts Down Under
programme.desc: A New York restaurant owner inherits a charming cafe in Lemon Myrtle Cove, Australia, where she starts to fall for the cafe's charismatic chef.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Josh's Third Serving
programme.desc: When after school programs see their funding cut, teachers Josh and Ella turn to fundraising before banding together in search of a larger donation, falling hard along the way.
